about_the_game:
Welcome to the exciting world of medieval jousting, where you get to be the manager behind a team of knights. Immerse yourself in the medieval era and lead your brave knights to glory through epic and challenging tournaments. Take charge of a jousting team and travel the world, participating in thrilling tournaments. Are you ready to forge your path to greatness?

You'll have two resources: money and fame. Participating in tournaments is the easiest way to earn them. Your knights will need weeks to recover after each game, so you must plan the season, decide which tournaments to enter, and choose the knights to send.

Manage the fame:

Reputation will be used to improve relations with noble houses, allowing you to buy their horses or sign their young squires, whom you can train into knights for your team. While squires, they'll be assigned to a knight, trained with them, and, most importantly, helped dress for tournaments, affecting how well or poorly they perform.

Similarly, reputation can also be spent on knights or staff without a team. During tournament transfer windows, it's crucial to determine the order in which teams can make offers; this order is determined by the amount of reputation you pay.

Gold coins will cover all expenses, including salaries, horse maintenance, facility expansion, and the armory.

Having the best armor, lances, bows, or saddles will be an ongoing race. All equipment will degrade at the end of each season, forcing teams to build new and better items continually.

Tournaments will feature five different events, with jousting as the main one. To win, players must choose each pass, the lance to use, speed, where to aim, and the type of strike pose. Pairings will be decided using a Swiss system, and there will be four other events between jousting rounds.

These include an archery competition, capturing the ring, throwing a wooden plank using lances, and hitting the medieval dummy with enough force to make it spin without getting hit.

name: Jousting Manager Demo
short_description: Jousting Manager allows you to play a sports management game from a new angle. Take control of a medieval jousting team and handle all aspects of the club as you compete to reach the top.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
